title: Lamar's Improvements
description:
Laura Rutledge and the NFL Live Crew discuss the improvements Lamar Jackson has made this year, what the Ravens need to do to beat the Bills and if the Rams can keep leaning on Cooper Kupp. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
